00025 // main system configuration
00026 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00027 // start the session
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00029 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';
00030 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/form_maker/simbio_form_table_AJAX.inc.php';
00031 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/template_parser/simbio_template_parser.inc.php';

00033 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/paging/simbio_paging_ajax.inc.php';
00034 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_DB/datagrid/simbio_dbgrid.inc.php';
00035 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_DB/simbio_dbop.inc.php';
00036 
00037 // privileges checking
00038 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('system', 'r');
00039 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('system', 'w');
00040 
00041 if (!$can_read) {
00042     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You don\'t have enough privileges to view this section').'</div>');
00043 }
00044 
00045 // log data save action
00046 if (isset($_POST['saveLogs']) AND $can_write AND $_SESSION['uid'] == 1) {
00047     $logs = $dbs->query('SELECT log_date, log_location, log_msg FROM system_log ORDER BY log_date DESC');
00048     header('Content-Type: text/plain');
00049     header('Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="system_logs_'.date('Ymd').'.log"');
00050     echo 'SENAYAN system logs record'."\n";
00051     while ($logs_d = $logs->fetch_row()) {
00052         echo '['.$logs_d[0].']---'.$logs_d[1].'---'.$logs_d[2]."\n";
00053     }
00054     exit();
00055 }
00056 
00057 // log data clearance action
00058 if (isset($_POST['clearLogs']) AND $can_write AND $_SESSION['uid'] == 1) {
00059     $dbs->query('TRUNCATE TABLE system_log');
00060     utility::jsAlert(__('System Log data completely cleared!'));
00061     echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'system/sys_log.php\', \'get\');</script>';
00062     exit();
00063 }
00064 
00065 /* search form */
00066 ?>
00067 <fieldset class="menuBox">
00068 <div class="menuBoxInner syslogIcon">
00069     <?php echo strtoupper(__('System Log'));?> -
00070     <?php if ($_SESSION['uid'] == 1) { ?>
00071     <a href="#" onclick="confSubmit('clearLogsForm', '<?php echo __('Are you SURE to completely clear system log data? This action cannot be undo!'); ?>')" class="headerText2" style="color: red;"><?php echo __('CLEAR LOGS'); ?></a>
00072     &nbsp; <a href="#" onclick="confSubmit('saveLogsForm', '<?php echo __('Save Logs record to file?'); ?>')" class="headerText2"><?php echo __('Save Logs To File'); ?></a>
00073     <?php } ?>
00074     <hr />
00075     <form name="search" action="blank.html" target="blindSubmit" onsubmit="$('doSearch').click();" id="search" method="get" style="display: inline;"><?php echo __('Search'); ?> :
00076     <input type="text" name="keywords" size="30" />
00077     <input type="button" id="doSearch" onclick="setContent('mainContent', '<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>system/sys_log.php?' + $('search').serialize(), 'get')" value="<?php echo __('Search'); ?>" class="button" />
00078     </form>
00079     <!-- LOG CLEARANCE FORM -->
00080     <?php if ($_SESSION['uid'] == 1) { ?>
00081     <form action="<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>system/sys_log.php" id="clearLogsForm" target="blindSubmit" method="post" style="display: inline;"><input type="hidden" name="clearLogs" value="true" /></form>
00082     <form action="<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>system/sys_log.php" id="saveLogsForm" target="blindSubmit" method="post" style="display: inline;"><input type="hidden" name="saveLogs" value="true" /></form>
00083     <?php } ?>
00084     <!-- LOG CLEARANCE FORM END -->
00085 </div>

00088 /* search form end */
00089 /* SYSTEM LOGS LIST */
00090 // table spec
00091 $table_spec = 'system_log AS sl';
00092 
00093 // create datagrid
00094 $datagrid = new simbio_datagrid();
00095 $datagrid->setSQLColumn(
00096     'sl.log_date AS \''.__('Time').'\'',
00097     'sl.log_location AS \''.__('Location').'\'',
00098     'sl.log_msg AS \''.__('Message').'\'');
00099 $datagrid->setSQLorder('sl.log_date DESC');
00100 
00101 // is there any search
00102 if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00103     $keyword = $dbs->escape_string(trim($_GET['keywords']));
00104     $words = explode(' ', $keyword);
00105     if (count($words) > 1) {
00106         $concat_sql = ' (';
00107         foreach ($words as $word) {
00108             $concat_sql .= " (sl.log_date LIKE '%$word%' OR sl.log_msg LIKE '%$word%') AND";
00109         }
00110         // remove the last AND
00111         $concat_sql = substr_replace($concat_sql, '', -3);
00112         $concat_sql .= ') ';
00113         $datagrid->setSQLCriteria($concat_sql);
00114     } else {
00115         $datagrid->setSQLCriteria("sl.log_date LIKE '%$keyword%' OR sl.log_msg LIKE '%$keyword%'");
00116     }
00117 }
00118 
00119 // set table and table header attributes
00120 $datagrid->icon_edit = SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'admin/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['dir'].'/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['theme'].'/edit.gif';
00121 $datagrid->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00122 $datagrid->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00123 // set delete proccess URL
00124 $datagrid->delete_URL = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00125 $datagrid->column_width = array('18%', '10%', '72%');
00126 $datagrid->disableSort('Message');
00127 
00128 // put the result into variables
00129 $datagrid_result = $datagrid->createDataGrid($dbs, $table_spec, 50, false);
00130 if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00131     $msg = str_replace('{result->num_rows}', $datagrid->num_rows, __('Found <strong>{result->num_rows}</strong> from your keywords')); //mfc
00132     echo '<div class="infoBox">'.$msg.' : "'.$_GET['keywords'].'"</div>';
00133 }
00134 
00135 echo $datagrid_result;
00136 /* main content end */
00137 ?>
